articles.title: Tennis-'Perfect start' for Ruud with title victory at Argentina Open
articles.description: Norway's Casper Ruud said he made the "perfect start" to the 2022 season after winning his seventh ATP tour title at the Argentina Open in Buenos Aires on Sunday.
articles.content: Norway's Casper Ruud said he made the "perfect start" to the 2022 season after winning his seventh ATP tour title at the Argentina Open in Buenos Aires on Sunday. Ruud bounced back from a shaky start to defeat local favorite Diego Schwartzman 5-7 6-2... [1038 chars]

articles.title: Top-seed Casper Ruud beats Diego Schwartzman to win Argentina Open
articles.description: The 23-year-old Norwegian has never lost at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club, holding a record of 9 wins and 0 losses.
articles.content:
The 23-year-old Norwegian has never lost at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club, holding a record of 9 wins and 0 losses.

articles.title: Top-seeded Ruud beats Schwartzman to win Argentina Open
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Casper Ruud of Norway beat home-crowd favorite Diego Schwartzman 5-7, 6-2, 6-3 on Sunday to win his second Argentina Open.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Casper Ruud of Norway beat home-crowd favorite Diego Schwartzman 5-7, 6-2, 6-3 on Sunday to win his second Argentina Open.
“It feels very good to have the trophy back in my hands,” said Ruud, who was the tournament’s top seed and ... [1057 chars]

articles.title: Top-seeded Ruud and Schwartzman to play Argentina Open final
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Top-seeded players Casper Ruud and Diego Schwartzman will play in Sunday’s final of the Argentina Open.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Top-seeded players Casper Ruud and Diego Schwartzman will play in Sunday’s final of the Argentina Open.
The Norwegian Ruud, the 8th-best ranked player, and the Argentinian Schwartzman, the 15th-best player, won the 2020 and 2021 e... [799 chars]

articles.title: Casper Ruud reaches semifinals of Argentina Open; rain stops play
articles.description: Casper Ruud will play sixth-seeded Federico Delbonis in the semi-finals, who beat Italy's Fabio Fognini, the fourth seed, 6-4, 6-4.
articles.content:
Casper Ruud will play sixth-seeded Federico Delbonis in the semi-finals, who beat Italy's Fabio Fognini, the fourth seed, 6-4, 6-4.

articles.title: Tiago PZK, LIT Killah, Nicki Nicole, Maria Becerra Top Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: It's the title with the third-most weeks at No. 1, along with Maluma and The Weeknd’s “Hawai” and Pedro Capo’s “Calma” with Farruko, since the chart launched in 2018.
articles.content:
Tiago PZK, LIT Killah, Nicki Nicole and Maria Becerra are pushing to break a record as their remix of “Entre Nosotros” tops the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated Feb. 5) for a 12th week.
It’s the third-most weeks at the top, along with Maluma ... [2630 chars]

articles.title: Argentina's Puerta 8: the barrio and the deadly cocaine
articles.description: A dozen children stare as if hypnotized at the fire heating a pot of stew.

articles.title: Argentina Open: Fabio Fognini Finds Winning Formula in Buenos Aires
articles.description: Fabio Fognini defeated Pedro Martinez 6-4, 7-6(5) to book his place in the quarter-finals of the Argentina Open.
articles.content: Fabio Fognini reached the quarter-finals of a tour-level event for the first time since April, defeating Spain’s Pedro Martinez 6-4, 7-6(5) at the Argentina Open. The fourth seed Italian set the wheels in motion as he out-maneuvered Martinez with his... [2219 chars]
